name: i was trying to make a game, but my dog was sitting on my lap
name_original: i was trying to make a game, but my dog was sitting on my lap
description:
a little bit of rambling for Manifesto Jam
games are art, and art is for everyone

click and then use the arrow keys or hit enter to start, arrow keys to move
(or tap and then swipe if on mobile!)

[transcript available as a .txt file in the downloads, for easier read]
